Container.Name: ddns-ipv64
Container.Overview:
This Docker container is a DDNS updater for Free DynDNS - ipv64.net.
If the ipv4 address at the site is changed, the new ipv4 address is sent to ipv64.net as an A-Record.
Container.Requires: List of all Parameters that can be configured https://github.com/alcapone1933/docker-ddns-ipv64?tab=readme-ov-file#env-parameter

Config.Name: Polling frequency IP address
Config.Description: Polling frequency of the current IP address

Config.Name: Polling frequenz Domain
Config.Description: Polling frequenz for the domain (dig DOMAIN_IPV64 A)

Config.Name: Domain Key
Config.Description: DOMAIN KEY: YOUR DOMAIN KEY or DynDNS update hash can be found at https://ipv64.net/dyndns.php

Config.Name: Domain Präfix yes|no
Config.Description: DOMAIN PRAEFIX YES: This means that the domain PRAEFIX is actively used

Config.Name: Domain Präfix
Config.Description: YOUR DOMAIN PRAEFIX (subdomain) : ⚠️ Use only one prefix ⚠️ e.g. ddns

Config.Name: IP check
Config.Description: IP CHECK: The IP address of the domain is checked

Config.Name: Shoutrrr URL
Config.Description: SHOUTRRR URL: Your Shoutrrr URL as notification service e.g. ( gotify,discord,telegram,email)

Config.Name: Shoutrrr URL Skip Test
Config.Description: SHOUTRRR_SKIP_TEST: No test message is sent when the container is started

Config.Name: Name Server
Config.Description: NAME_SERVER: : The name server to check the IP address of your domain
